com.radirius.mercury.graphics.font

Class TrueTypeFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.graphics.font.TrueTypeFont
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Font, Resource, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class TrueTypeFont
extends java.lang.Object
implements Font
    A font type for .TTF's and .OTF's.
    Author:
    wessles, Jeviny, Sri Harsha Chilakapati

      • deriveFont

        public Font deriveFont(float size)
        Description copied from interface: Font
